column1: File:Ted Nasmith - Lúthien at Tol Galen.jpg at Tol Galen by Ted NasmithTol Galen was the green isle set amidst the waters of the River Adurant in Ossiriand.

column2: Beren and Lúthien dwelt in Tol Galen for the remainder of their time within the confines of Eä. It was here that their son
